titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of copper and brass sheet and strip.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/8/2000--Introduced. Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of copper and brass sheet and strip.
